publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1258.1 Elizabeth Smith: Education—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1258) in the name of Rhona Brankin, leave out from "; notes the SNP’s commitment" to end and insert "and the need for energy efficiency, quality design including the incorporation of sound ecological and sustainable design principles, and value for money for the public purse in building schools; recognises the need for the Scottish Government and local authorities to continue to improve Scotland’s school estate; notes the SNP’s commitment to match the previous administration’s proposed school building programme "brick for brick", and calls on the Scottish Government to make a statement to the Parliament detailing its plans for new schools and how these will be funded."
